featured.text: Although Mr. Chen is rich, he is a very _____ person and is never willing to spend any money to help those who are in need.
_ measures are a must when President Chen travels around the island.

definition.zh_def: 陳述，表達或展示某事物。
definition.en_def: To state, express, or present something.
definition.example: She will chen her thoughts during the meeting.
